name: Little Seed Grow
description:
[Description]

This short game is a lighthearted and wholesome experience as you grow your seed to bore different fruits of human values. With an awesome soundtrack from Rachel Coleman and relaxing soundtracks from NH Pictures and Turpak, presented a great existential lesson to us all, that our ways as we grow as a person, has an effect on the fruits that we may bore. 

Made for the "One Button Game Jam 2020" This game jam aims to let the user only use one button control throughout its game to help people of disabilities to play without the struggle of many button presses.

[Instructions]

Use the Left-Mouse Button to scroll from different powers. Toggle a power that the plant wanted.

When you switch to the power of wind, all the bugs will not eat the plant, but it will deduct your progress and if a bug eats the plant, it will also deduct your progress.

There are currently 2 endings for the game. Try to achieve the endings from basing it on the hints.

[After note]

This is my first ever game jam and published game ever, so I'm very excited about this. Please do not hesitate to criticize, report bugs and suggestions down below. I will sure update it if ever necessary! Good day and more power! <3
